title: System Design Level 3 â€” Caching & Load Balancing
intro: This level introduces caching and load balancers to handle higher load.
points: Understand what a cache is and why it is used.
Differentiate between client-side, CDN and server-side caches.
Know basic cache policies: TTL, LRU (concept), write-through vs write-back (concept).
Understand what a load balancer does.
Know simple LB strategies: round-robin, least connections (concept only).
